Infectum.turoyo: noše nuxroye aṯən ḏ̣ayfe gaban w-oṯən noše me gaban məʕtadən aʕlayye hano lat-yo ṭowo b-u=ḥaq d-i=mamlak-ayḏi
translations: ‘Foreign people came to us as guests, and some of us go and infringe on these people (guests)? This is not right according to the law of my kingdom’

tokens.value: noše nuxroye aṯən ḏ̣ayfe gaban w-oṯən noše me gaban məʕtadən aʕlayye hano lat-yo ṭowo b-u=ḥaq d-i=mamlak-ayḏi
‘Foreign people came to us as guests, and some of us go and infringe on these people (guests)? This is not right according to the law of my kingdom’

Infectum.text: noše nuxroye aṯən ḏ̣ayfe gaban w-oṯən noše me gaban məʕtadən aʕlayye hano lat-yo ṭowo b-u=ḥaq d-i=mamlak-ayḏi ‘Foreign people came to us as guests, and some of us go and infringe on these people (guests)? This is not right according to the law of my kingdom’ 83/87;
